meanings.definition: A person who pleases or aims to please others.
meanings.sent1: She always tries to be a pleaser by helping everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: The entertainer was a real crowd pleaser at the party.
meanings.sent3: The pleaser in the group made sure everyone had a good time.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a pleaser, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: Being a pleaser can sometimes lead to neglecting one's own needs.

meanings.definition: Something that pleases or is intended to please.
meanings.sent1: The cake was a real pleaser with its delicious frosting.
meanings.sent2: The movie was a pleaser, leaving the audience in a good mood.
meanings.sent3: The new gadget was a pleaser, making everyone excited to try it out.
meanings.sent4: The painting was a pleaser, capturing the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent5: The surprise gift was a pleaser, bringing joy to her heart.
